Text.Page:
The Temple of Dagon is the nagas' holy sanctuary. That makes it particularly dangerous for the expedition team who's there now.

I'd like you to reinforce them, if you're willing. Report to Liyaqat at the Ecdysi Atrium. Good luck.

Thank the gods you're here! It looks like the besharans have teamed up with the nagas to drive us out of here. That's a scary alliance if I ever heard one, so I hope I'm wrong.

Take down a few of those {@LinkCreature:42#400#besharan runners}. See if you can find evidence they're working together.

Well done. We'll be studying this.

Oh, and I have a reward for you.

Did you find any proof yet of an alliance between gulas and nagas?

Just keep killing gulas, then. We'll all be better off.
